sync-votes.name: Sync AniDB Votes
sync-votes.info: Sync Series & Episode Votes from Shoko to AniDB.

sync-mylist.name: OVERWRITE AniDB MyList
sync-mylist.info: Syncs all Series & Episode watch state data from Shoko to AniDB. THIS IS A ONE-WAY ACTION AND WILL OVERWRITE ALL ANIDB DATA!

add-all-manually-linked-files-to-mylist.name: Add All Manual Links To MyList
add-all-manually-linked-files-to-mylist.info: Syncs Manually Linked Episodes to your MyList. File entries on AniDB will show up as Generic.

download-missing-anidb-data.name: Download Missing AniDB Data
download-missing-anidb-data.info: Downloads XML data from AniDB forcefully. Use this only if the XML has been edited, deleted, or if Shoko has unexpectedly closed or crashed.

update-anidb-calendar.name: Update AniDB Calendar
update-anidb-calendar.info: Updates the 'Upcoming Anime' calendar in Shoko with the most recent information from AniDB.

update-all-anidb-info.name: Update All AniDB Info
update-all-anidb-info.info: Update all Series information with the latest data from AniDB.

get-anidb-notifications.name: Get AniDB Notifications
get-anidb-notifications.info: Fetch unread notifications and messages from AniDB

process-moved-files.name: Process Moved Files
process-moved-files.info: Process file moved messages from AniDB. This will force an update on the affected files.

sync-trakt.name: Sync Trakt Collection
sync-trakt.info: Sync watch states from Shoko to Trakt. THIS IS A ONE-WAY ACTION AND WILL OVERWRITE ALL TRAKT DATA!

update-all-trakt-info.name: Update All Trakt Info
update-all-trakt-info.info: Sync all info for Series from Trakt to Shoko.

purge-all-tvdb-info.name: Purge All TVDB Info
purge-all-tvdb-info.info: Purges all TVDB data from Shoko, including all images, episodes, series and cross-references. Will also disable auto-linking for TvDB. THIS IS A ONE-WAY ACTION AND WILL CLEAR OUT ALL TVDB DATA!

run-import.name: Run Import
run-import.info: This checks for new files, hashes them etc, scans Drop Folders, checks and scans for community site links (trakt, tmdb, etc), and downloads missing images.

import-new-files.name: Import New Files
import-new-files.info: Queues a task to import only new files found in the import folder

avdump-mismatched-files.name: AVDump Mismatched Files
avdump-mismatched-files.info: Scans the library, detects files without a hash match in AniDB, and runs AVDump on them.

update-all-mediainfo.name: Update All Mediainfo
update-all-mediainfo.info: Runs MediaInfo on every file in your collection to update their metadata.

update-series-stats.name: Update Series Stats
update-series-stats.info: Updates all series in your collection, recalculating totals, remainders, and watched statuses of items.

update-missing-anidb-file-release-groups.name: Update Missing AniDB Release Groups
update-missing-anidb-file-release-groups.info: Checks AniDB for updated data on files in your collection that lack a release group.

update-missing-anidb-file-info.name: Update Missing AniDB File Info
update-missing-anidb-file-info.info: Updates AniDB files lacking file information, including those missing release groups and those with outdated internal data versions.

update-all-images.name: Update All Images
update-all-images.info: Updates and downloads all missing images from AniDB and TMDB.

validate-all-images.name: Validate All Images
validate-all-images.info: Identifies any invalid images and re-downloads them.

search-for-tmdb-matches.name: Search for TMDB Matches
search-for-tmdb-matches.info: Scan for TMDB matches for all unlinked AniDB anime.

update-all-tmdb-movies.name: Update All TMDB Movies
update-all-tmdb-movies.info: Updates all TMDB Movies in the local database.

update-all-tmdb-shows.name: Update All TMDB Shows
update-all-tmdb-shows.info: Updates all TMDB Shows in the local database.

delete-unused-tmdb-movies.name: Delete Unused TMDB Movies
delete-unused-tmdb-movies.info: Deletes all unused TMDB Movies that are not linked to any AniDB anime.

delete-unused-tmdb-shows.name: Delete Unused TMDB Shows
delete-unused-tmdb-shows.info: Deletes all unused TMDB Shows that are not linked to any AniDB anime.

download-missing-tmdb-people.name: Download Missing TMDB People
download-missing-tmdb-people.info: Downloads any TMDB People missing in the local database.

purge-tmdb-movie-collections.name: Delete All TMDB Movie Collections
purge-tmdb-movie-collections.info: Deletes all TMDB Movie Collections stored in the local database, and removes any images associated with them.

purge-tmdb-show-alternate-orderings.name: Delete All TMDB Show Alternate Orderings
purge-tmdb-show-alternate-orderings.info: Deletes all TMDB Show Alternate Orderings stored in the local database.

remove-missing-files-mylist.name: Remove Missing Files
remove-missing-files-mylist.info: Deletes entries in Shoko and MyList for files that are no longer accessible.

remove-missing-files.name: Remove Missing Files (Keep in MyList)
remove-missing-files.info: Deletes entries in Shoko, while retaining them in MyList, for files that are no longer accessible.

recreate-all-groups.name: Recreate All Groups
recreate-all-groups.info: Deletes all existing groups in Shoko and recreates them.

rename-all-groups.name: Rename All Groups
rename-all-groups.info: Renames all default groups, excluding those with custom names, using the current language settings.
